jobRoles.title: Sales Representative
jobRoles.description: Responsible for in-store promotions, customer engagement, and meeting sales targets.
responsibilities: Conduct in-store promotions and product demonstrations
Engage with customers to understand their needs
Meet daily and monthly sales targets
jobRoles.experience: Minimum 2 years of retail sales experience

jobRoles.title: Warehouse Operative
jobRoles.description: Responsible for efficient warehouse operations including loading, unloading, and inventory management.
responsibilities: Manage inventory and ensure stock accuracy
Operate forklifts and other warehouse machinery
jobRoles.experience: At least 1 year of warehouse experience

jobRoles.title: Inside Sales Representative
jobRoles.description: Drive sales through outbound calls and digital communication, maintaining customer relationships.
responsibilities: Initiate outbound calls to potential customers
Manage sales leads and follow-up communications

jobRoles.title: Construction Laborer
jobRoles.description: Support construction projects through manual labor, equipment operation, and on-site maintenance.
responsibilities: Assist with the setup and teardown of construction sites
Ensure site safety and compliance with regulations
technicalRequirements: Ability to operate manual and powered equipment
jobRoles.experience: Experience in construction or similar manual labor is preferred
jobRoles.education: High school diploma; vocational training is a plus

jobRoles.title: Account Manager - Sales
jobRoles.description: Manage key client accounts, drive sales growth, and maintain long-term customer relationships in a competitive market.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain relationships with key clients
Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling
Prepare and deliver presentations to clients
technicalRequirements: Experience with CRM and sales analytics tools
jobRoles.experience: Minimum 3 years in sales or account management
jobRoles.education: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field preferred

additionalCriteria.shiftTimings: Standard business hours with occasional travel
